page.title: 01Elston and District
page.content: If you were flying over the area by helicopter it would look like a giant jigsaw puzzle, with all the fields of crops and grassland fitting together perfectly.Many small copses and farms like pieces of a broken toy are cast down by a giant unseen hand. Roads going through look like veins with paths like small arteries and capillaries.The area is very rural with mainly farms dotted about.The population is very spread out consisting of part of a village and a couple of hamlets .The landscape is very uneven.In summer the fields look golden and green .Most of the activity is focused on farming with machinery almost constantly humming.
